title: Reader Preferences
description: Configure reading experience settings for your library. Set default preferences that serve as overrides for individual books, or allow each book to maintain its own custom settings for PDF, EPUB, FB2, MOBI, AZW3, and CBX formats.

appMode.title: Settings Application Mode
appMode.description: Configure how default reader settings are applied across your library. Choose "Default Override" to enforce your preferred defaults across all books of the same format, or select "Book-Specific" to preserve individual reading preferences for each book.
appMode.pdfDesc: Control whether your default zoom level, page layout, and navigation preferences apply to all PDFs or if each document retains its own settings.
appMode.ebookDesc: Determine whether your default font, theme, and layout preferences apply to all eBooks (EPUB, FB2, MOBI, AZW3) or if each book maintains its own settings.
appMode.comicDesc: Set whether your default page layout, reading direction, and scaling preferences apply to all comics (CBZ, CBR, CB7) or if each file keeps its own settings.
appMode.streamingPdfDesc: Choose whether your default view mode, fit mode, and scroll direction apply to all streaming PDFs or if each document maintains its own configuration.

ebook.sectionDesc: Set default preferences for eBook formats (EPUB, FB2, MOBI, AZW3). When "Default Override" mode is active, these settings will override individual book preferences. Configure typography, themes, text flow, and layout options.
ebook.themeDesc: Select a color scheme to match your reading environment and comfort.
ebook.darkModeDesc: Switch between light and dark backgrounds for day or night reading.
ebook.fontFamilyDesc: Choose a typeface that best suits your reading preference.
ebook.fontSizeDesc: Increase or decrease text size in points for optimal readability.
ebook.lineHeightDesc: Adjust vertical spacing between lines for better legibility.
ebook.textJustificationDesc: Align text to the left or justify it for a clean edge on both sides.
ebook.hyphenationDesc: Enable to break long words at line ends for a smoother text flow.
ebook.flowDesc: Choose between paginated (page-by-page) or continuous scrolling flow.
ebook.maxColumnsDesc: Set how many columns the text is split into on wide screens.
ebook.columnGapDesc: Control the space between columns for a balanced layout.
ebook.maxWidthDesc: Limit the maximum width of the reading area for easier line tracking.
ebook.maxHeightDesc: Limit the maximum height of the reading area to fit your screen.

pdf.sectionDesc: Set default preferences for PDF documents. When "Default Override" mode is active, these settings will override individual document preferences. Configure zoom levels, display modes, scroll behavior, and navigation.
pdf.pageSpreadDesc: Choose how PDF pages are displayed - single page or double page spread view.
pdf.pageZoomDesc: Set the default zoom level for PDF documents to enhance readability.

cbx.sectionDesc: Set default preferences for comic book archives (CBZ, CBR, CB7). When "Default Override" mode is active, these settings will override individual file preferences. Configure page layout, reading direction, and image rendering.
cbx.pageSpreadDesc: Configure how comic book pages are displayed - single page or double page spread.
cbx.pageLayoutDesc: Choose how comic pages are displayed while reading.
cbx.fitModeDesc: Select how images should be scaled to fit the reader window.
cbx.scrollModeDesc: Choose between paginated or infinite scroll reading experience.
cbx.backgroundColorDesc: Set the background color for the comic reader.

streamingPdf.sectionDesc: Configure default preferences for the streaming PDF reader. When "Default Override" mode is enabled, these settings will take precedence over per-file preferences. Adjust page layout, zoom behavior, scrolling mode, and rendering options for an optimal reading experience.
streamingPdf.pageSpreadDesc: Configure how PDF pages are displayed - single page or double page spread.
streamingPdf.pageLayoutDesc: Choose how PDF pages are displayed while reading.
streamingPdf.fitModeDesc: Select how pages should be scaled to fit the reader window.
streamingPdf.scrollModeDesc: Choose between paginated or infinite scroll reading experience.
streamingPdf.backgroundColorDesc: Set the background color for the PDF reader.

toast.preferencesUpdatedDetail: Your preferences have been saved successfully.

fonts.sectionDesc: Personalize your reading experience by uploading custom fonts to use with eBook formats (EPUB, FB2, MOBI, AZW3). Upload up to 10 custom font files that will be available for selection in the eBook reader settings.
fonts.emptyDesc: Upload your favorite fonts to personalize your reading experience.
fonts.emptyHint: Click the "Add New Font" button above to get started.
fonts.deleteFontConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the font "{{name}}"?

upload.title: Add New Font
upload.description: Upload a custom font for your EPUB reader
upload.displayNameDesc: This name will appear in the font selector when reading EPUB books.
upload.previewFailedDetail: Unable to preview font, but you can still upload it
upload.noFileSelectedDetail: Please select a font file to upload
upload.uploadFailedInvalid: Invalid file format or quota exceeded
upload.invalidFileTypeDetail: Please upload a TTF, OTF, WOFF, or WOFF2 font file
